As Megaton flies toward Starscream he catches the sight of Inferno attackin=
g Scyther. "So you also use elemental attacks, then I will show you how to =
use them." He launches a blast of flaming material from his nose, and a fir=
eball from his mouth. He doesn't look to see if he hit, he turns his attent=
ion back on Starscream flying head to head at the oncoming jet.
  ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
  From: JP3884@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

nt: Sunday, December 17, 2000 6:06 AM
  Subject: Re: fire wall


       Ram=
page leaps on top of Demise, the fallen bot had just skid across 
  the tun=
dra from several of his shots. "Ah, I want to savor your fear...breath 
  i=
t in..." He says, and inhales deeply, seeming to get enjoyment out of the 
=
  bots temporary pain. Rampage turns to his arm, once bloddy and bleeding, =
it 
  is now frozen. At least he didnt have to worry about bleeding to deat=
h, the 
  ice clot saved him from that. 
        "And now, its time to end =
this playing." He said gruffly, raised his 
  missle launcher, and fired po=
int blank. 

        Tankkor flipped three times, as far as he can remember=
. His right 
  crawler was damaged so he transformed and turned once agian =
to Endbringer. 
  More mech oozed its way out of his wounds and left silver=
 puddles in the snow. 
        No more marching, now he was going to get th=
is bot. With a sting in 
  his knee, he ran as fast as his large body could=
 go and dove at Endbringer, 
  vast arms extended to keep the bot at bay. 
=

        Paralysis hears a thud. It must be Scather falling, finally. He po=
ints 
  his wrist at a dent in the snow, and fires. THe black liquid was su=
pposed to 
  be his paralizing toxin, but due to the cold it's chemical com=
pound wasnt 
  going to be very effective. But, it would allow Paralysis to=
 see the bot. 
        As the liquid spry settled on the ground, he saw the=
 faint outline of 
  Scather lying on the snow. 
        "Looks like we've =
evened the odds a bit!" Paralysis say, and with a 
  left broken arm moves =
forward, now with pistol in hand, and begins a shoot 
  out. 
        Infer=
no buzzes around the air, sees now Scather who was once very 
  invisable. =
"Ah ha! The invader!" He soars down and releases fireball after 
  fireball=
.
